revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Biblia sacra polyglotta : complectentia textus originales, Hebraicum, cum Pentateucho Samaritano, Chaldaicum, Græcum ; versionumque antiquarum, Samaritanæ, Græcæ..."
revision.text: Possibly: Biblia sacra polyglotta : complectentia textus originales, Hebraicum, cum Pentateucho Samaritano, Chaldaicum, Græcum ; versionumque antiquarum, Samaritanæ, Græcæ, Chaldaicæ, Syriacæ (LXXII Interp.)...opus totum in sex tomos tributum, by Brian Walton, Thomas Roycroft, Wenceslaus Hollar, Pierre Lombard, William Marsden. (Londini : Imprimebat Thomas Roycroft, 1657). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/681136598
